channel.title: Logo
channel.description:
A final project of mine. I actually like it, and will probably use it from now on to tag my videos at the very end.
The current version on there now is still lo-res. When it's completely finished processing it'll be HD.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fh9ADeP_m6k

item.title: Logo
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

the blue looks to plain to me, but i like simplicity so its iffy.

I like it though.

Read full topic

item.title: Logo
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Needs more variation in the sound of the letter’s hitting the glass. It takes too long for us too see your name, and it’s only there for a brief second. I would suggest making more than one letter hit the glass at a time, to speed it up. Also, do you plan on changing the background? I wouldn’t leave it as that aquamarine color.

EDIT: Also, the top and bottom of the tornado are missing, maybe use the camera to hide that? There’s a part near the beginning when the tornado is moving from the right side, where it seems to skip a frame. I’m assuming that was where the tornado was going forwarding, and then swinging back into place. I’m sure it was on purpose, but the frame skip looked odd.

I’m not sure if this is the finished product or not, if it isn’t then forgive me, I’m sure you noticed these things.

Read full topic
